MICRO
m00 0000000000011100001100000011000111010111//DIP_SW+0->MAR,PC//BOOTSTRAP
m01 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000//NEXT(PC)
m02 0000000000010100001100110011010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR//LOADBR#K
m03 0000000000011100001100000110000110011101//MDR+0->BR
m04 0000000000010100001100110011010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR
m05 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000//NEXT(PC)
m06 0000000000010100001100110011010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR//LOADSP#K
m07 0000000000011100001100000101000110011101//MDR+0->SP
m08 0000000000010100001100110011010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR
m09 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000//NEXT(PC)
m0a 0000000000010100001100110011010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR//LOADLR#K
m0b 0000000000011100001100000111000110011101//MDR+0->LR
m0c 0000000000010100001100110011010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR
m0d 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000//NEXT(PC)
m0e 0000000000010100001100110011010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR//PUSH$K
m0f 0000000000000101000101010111000110111111//SP-LR->NOP,MSTATUS
m10 0010101101111100000100000000000010011111//BRNZ(5)
m11 0000000000011100000100000000000011011101//MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m12 0000000000011100001100000100000110011101//MDR+0->X
m13 0000000000010100101101010101010111011110//SP-1->SP,MAR
m14 0000000000010000000101000000000000111111//X+0->NOP,MWE~
m15 0000000000010100001100110011010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR
m16 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000//NEXT(PC)
m17 0000000000000101000101100101000110111111//BR-SP->NOP,MSTATUS//POP$K
m18 0011101101111100000100000000000010011111//BRNZ(7)
m19 0000000000010100000101010000010011011110//SP+1->NOP,MAR
m1a 0000000000011100001100000100000110011101//MDR+0->X
m1b 0000000000010100000100110000010011011110//PC+1->NOP,MAR
m1c 0000000000011100000100000000000011011101//MDR+0->NOP,MAR
m1d 0000000000010000000101000000000000111111//X+0->NOP,MWE~
m1e 0000000000010100001101010101010110011110//SP+1->SP
m1f 0000000000010100001100110011100111011110//PC+2->PC,MAR
m20 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000//NEXT(PC)
m21 0000000000000101000101100101000110111111//BR-SP->NOP,MSTATUS//ADD
m22 0011101101111100000100000000000010011111//BRNZ(7)
m23 0000000000010000000101010000000011011111//SP+0->NOP,MAR
m24 0000000000011100001100000100000110011101//MDR+0->X
m25 0000000000010100000101010000010011011110//SP+1->NOP
m26 0000000000000101000101100101000110111111//BR-SP->NOP,MSTATUS
m27 0001001101111100000100000000000010011111//BRNZ(2)
m28 0000000000010100000101000000000000011101//MDR+X->NOP,MWE~
m29 0000000000010100001100110011010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR
m2a 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000//NEXT(PC)
m2b 0000000000000101000101100101000110111111//BR-SP->NOP,MSTATUS//SUB
m2c 0011101101111100000100000000000010011111//BRNZ(7)
m2d 0000000000010000000101010000000011011111//SP+0->NOP,MAR
m2e 0000000000011100001100000100000110011101//MDR+0->X
m2f 0000000000010100000101010000010011011110//SP+1->NOP,MAR
m30 0000000000000101000101100101000110111111//BR-SP->NOP,MSTATUS
m31 0010001101111100000100000000000010011111//BRNZ(4)
m32 0000000000010101001101000100000110011101//MDR-X->X
m33 0000000000010000000101010000000011011111//SP+0->NOP,MAR
m34 0000000000010000000101000000000000011101//X+0->NOP,MWE~
m35 0000000000010100001100110011010111011110//PC+1->PC,MAR
m36 0000000000000000000100000000000010000000//NEXT(PC)
MAPPER
m00 02//LOADBR#K
m01 06//LOADSP#K
m02 0a//LOADLR#K
m03 0e//PUSH$K
m04 17//POP$K
m05 21//ADD
m06 2b//SUB
MAIN
m00 00//LOADBR#K
m01 29
m02 01//LOADSP#K
m03 29
m04 02//LOADLR#K
m05 20
m06 03//PUSH$K
m07 11
m08 03//PUSH$K
m09 12
m0a 06//SUB
m0b 03//PUSH$K
m0c 13
m0d 05//ADD
m0e 04//POP$K
m0f 14
m11 07//X
m12 04//Y
m13 05//Z
m14 00//W
